attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjSPkOSYZVFD3bzMo7_spelldescription
attribs.current: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take [[1d8]] radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjSUOMOoUjxcFH1DS0_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range.

• Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.

• You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

• You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

• You create an Instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

• You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

• You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjSaE4iZxMfc3uZ35Z_spelldescription
attribs.current: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an Attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the Attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjSaE4iZxMfc3uZ35Z_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjScdIPPe6djVvJzJA_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to [[1d8 + 2]]. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjScdIPPe6djVvJzJA_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjSeEeaHspuBYa7Pfj_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You ward a creature within range against Attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who Targets the warded creature with an Attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the Attack or spell. This spell doesn't protect the warded creature from area effects, such as the explosion of a Fireball.

If the warded creature makes an Attack or casts a spell that affects an enemy creature, this spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KPjS8hwwWvtruTaVaKH_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KPjdppPO-kew2KakKLa_description
attribs.current: The spy makes two Melee Attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KPjdsiGWqNtmicEXSVZ_description
attribs.current: On each of its turns, the spy can use a Bonus Action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KPje0yGoErwSV9c1tWa_description
attribs.current: The spy deals an extra [[2d6]] damage when it hits a target with a weapon Attack and has advantage on the Attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the spy that isn't Incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the Attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KQlosbUwZFU5SMSeGwJ_description
attribs.current: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon Attack rolls during that turn, but Attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KQlsw30nm58o-PZuTTl_description
attribs.current: The gibbering mouther makes one bite Attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KQlsp2lQP0w8YXr8rPF_desc
attribs.current: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KQlt5Qbtha0ErBeI602_desc
attribs.current: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't Incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its Movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee Attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an Attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KQltPpZ7u59j6TDzZ3N_description
attribs.current: If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KQltdW2nvRlG1FgUDpL_description
attribs.current: (Recharge 5-6) The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be Blinded until the end of the mouther's next turn.

attribs.name: npcd_resistances
attribs.current: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t silvered

attribs.name: npcd_condition_immunities
attribs.current: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t silvered

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcPdsVCZvI7xRUARMWZ_description
attribs.current: On a hit, the target’s Strength score is reduced by one-half that amount. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

attribs.name: npcd_resistances
attribs.current: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t silvered

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t silvered

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcPfi-cMBZzzOp-Wak8_desc
attribs.current:
The drowned maiden’s hair attacks as though it were three separate limbs, each of which can be attacked (AC 19; 15 hit points; immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage; resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren’t silvered). A lock of hair can be broken if a creature takes an action and
succeeds on a DC 15 Strength check against it.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcPfwAwclh9FbVEZmSC_desc
attribs.current:
The drowned maiden’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). She can innately cast the
following spells, requiring no material components: 

At will: disguise self, silence

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcPg2o1CQqqsQfC4nl8_description
attribs.current: The drowned maiden makes two claw attacks and one hair attack, each of which it can replace with one kiss attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcPgHdw9k8WZ-ZfXA6B_description
attribs.current: On a hit, the target is grappled, escape DC 16. Three creatures can be grappled at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcPgW-pLw-HvsAXWVfS_description
attribs.current:
The drowned maiden can kiss one target that is grappled and adjacent to her. The target must succeed on a DC 15
Charisma saving throw or take 1d6 Strength damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcPgbxqhcH8bRl6JWp7_description
attribs.current: The drowned maiden pulls a grappled creature of Large size or smaller up to 15 feet straight toward herself.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KReN68nBOUsSb9OzyDl_description
attribs.current: 1d10+3 damage if used with two hands.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KReNb26ZLHl332F45JD_desc
attribs.current: The veteran makes two Longsword attacks. If it has a Shortsword drawn, it can also make a Shortsword Attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KReN68nBOUsSb9OzyDl_description
attribs.current: 1d10+3 damage if used with two hands.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KReNb26ZLHl332F45JD_desc
attribs.current: The veteran makes two Longsword attacks. If it has a Shortsword drawn, it can also make a Shortsword Attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KReT8w01aVNrER7a4Eu_desc
attribs.current: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KReTB-kXZ1k-FkQaqlU_desc
attribs.current: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an Attack during the first round of Combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the Attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KReTr9527Ae24oJLrjy_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +4, Reach 5 ft or 30/120 ft, One target.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KReTr9527Ae24oJLrjy_description
attribs.current: If using as a ranged weapon, does [[1d6+2]] dmg, otherwise..

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcZYySwajsXnEKxWbEU_desc
attribs.current:
The gremlin’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At Will: prestidigitation
3/day: hex

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcZZ5V-l-8FOMpmbuIQ_desc
attribs.current: The gremlin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZZCzlfDStZ1G-98Pq_description
attribs.current: The goblin makes one claw attack and one bite attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZZZTP1RTpJkNBQdf3_description
attribs.current: A rum gremlin radiates an aura of drunkenness to a radius of 20 feet. Every creature that starts its turn in the aura must make a successful DC 12 Constitution saving throw against poison or be poisoned for one hour. Creatures that have drunk any alcohol during the previous hour have disadvantage on the saving throw. While affected by this poison, a creature falls prone if it tries to move more than half its speed during a turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZZvHM93gd6CBMhk8F_spelldescription
attribs.current:
This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spell-casters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range:

* You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.
* You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
* You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
* You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.
* You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
* You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZZxJOA08Jp0F2SeKl_spelldescription
attribs.current: You place a curse on a creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra [[1d6]] necrotic damage to the target when ever you hit it with an attack. Also, choose one ability when you cast the spell. The target has disadvantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability. If the target drops to 0 hit points before this spell ends, you can use a bonus action on a turn of yours to curse a new creature. A remove curse cast on the target ends this spell early.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZZxJOA08Jp0F2SeKl_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: the petrified eye of a newt

attribs.name: npc_content
attribs.current:
**Commoners** include peasants, serfs, slaves, servants,  pilgrims, merchants, artisans, and hermits.



 Actions

**Club**: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

attribs.name: npc_content
attribs.current:
**Fanatics** are often part of a cult’s leadership, using  their charisma and dogma to influence and prey on  those of weak will. Most are interested in personal  power above all else.



 Traits

**Dark Devotion**: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

**Spellcasting**: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared: 

• Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

 Actions

**Multiattack**: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.



**Dagger (Melee)**: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.



**Dagger (Ranged)**: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

attribs.name: npcd_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcZeYJDuJpkjAIqPWlY_desc
attribs.current: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

attribs.current:

• Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZnhsHyqdlRYxEZBEf_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZntdN8prvUkYtKgLP_spelldescription
attribs.current: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take [[1d8]] radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZo0ZRqJpcge0EkQhc_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range.

• Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.

• You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

• You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

• You create an Instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

• You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

• You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZoB7ev33chdRx1psZ_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn’t understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the DM determines how the target behaves. If the target can’t follow your command, the spell ends.

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target falls prone and then ends its turn.

Halt. The target doesn’t move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZoTYT9eoCtVbAeF15_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes [[3d10]] necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZoqK1fKTJGyniiLkC_spelldescription
attribs.current: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZoqK1fKTJGyniiLkC_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZp5dc5QIIiPOxZ3EU_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZp5dc5QIIiPOxZ3EU_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a small, straight piece of iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZpHUp4j7zYm8Czlet_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to [[1d8 + 1]].

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell’s effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcZjlyjRJQLQJ3BuUfd_desc
attribs.current: The krake spawn can breathe air and water.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcZjrlzgoZ5B8ROS-Rf_desc
attribs.current: While underwater, the krake spawn can take the withdraw action to jet backward at a speed of 140 feet. It must move in a straight line while using this ability.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KcZk1tlIePS3vuZkiDj_desc
attribs.current:
The krake spawn’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: protection from energy, ray of frost
1/day: ice storm, wall of ice

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZkVENd29j3izlBPCj_description
attribs.current: The krake spawn makes eight tentacle attacks and one bite attack. It can subsitute one constrict attack for two tentacle attacks if it has a creature grappled at the start of the krake spawn’s turn, but it never constricts more than once per turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZkuFmlSE0hv6GewL6_description
attribs.current: If two tentacle attacks hit the same target in one turn, the target is also grappled, escape DC 17.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZl6hk9Nqo4uiuypF8_description
attribs.current: The constricted creature takes [[3d12 + 7]] bludgeoning damage and is grappled (escape DC 17) and restrained.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZlHyTE1X97TSeUNMN_description
attribs.current:
The krake spawn emits black, venomous ink in a 30-foot cloud as a bonus action while underwater. The cloud affects vision as the darkness spell, and any creature that starts its turn inside the cloud takes [[3d6]] poison damage, or half
damage with a successful DC 18 Constitution saving throw. The krake spawn’s darkvision is not impaired by this cloud. The cloud persists for 1 minute, then disperses.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-KcZlToCZlSINX1JxYZx_description
attribs.current: The krake spawn sprays halfdigested food from its maw over a 15-foot cone. This acidic slurry causes [[1d6]] acid damage and targets must make a successful DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of their next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZm-SxOwMUNipx6zjm_spelldescription
attribs.current: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack (to hit: [[1d20+4]])against the target. On a hit, it takes [[1d8]] cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZmHjbST8lAI8C2jDY_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[2d8]] bludgeoning damage and [[4d6]] cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Hailstones turn the storm's area of effect into difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZmHjbST8lAI8C2jDY_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a pinch of dust and a few drops of water

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZmhfZDEOndoNuRZMS_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-square panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1 foot thick and lasts for the duration.

If the wall cuts through a creature’s space when it appears, the creature within its area is pushed to one side of the wall and must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes [[10d6]] cold damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

The wall is an object that can be damaged and thus breached. It has AC 12 and 30 hit points per 10-foot section, and it is vulnerable to fire damage. Reducing a 10-foot section of wall to 0 hit points destroys it and leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. A creature moving through the sheet of frigid air for the first time on a turn must make a Constitution saving throw. That creature takes [[5d6]] cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZmhfZDEOndoNuRZMS_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a small piece o f quartz

attribs.name: repeating_spell-npc_-KcZlxaWmrVXcyoDWryR_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

attribs.name: npc_content
attribs.current:
**Commoners** include peasants, serfs, slaves, servants,  pilgrims, merchants, artisans, and hermits.



 Actions

**Club**: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I enjoy the praise my finished products bring me. Maybe a little too much.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Comrades. The people in whom I've put my trust come before everyone else (Neutral).

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: the mentor who taught me is the most important person in my life - a dwarf named Groffdorin.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I am inclined to think the best of a fellow craftsman, even in the face of a clear evidence to the contrary.

attribs.name: features_and_traits
attribs.current:
KOBOLD FEATURES........
Darkvision: 60'

Blindsider. Once per round, you can gain advantage on an attack against a creature within 5' if you have an ally also within 5' of the target.

Sunlight Sensitivity: You have a disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks in bright sunlight.

ROGUE FEATURES...............
Archetype - Arcane Trickster

Cunning Action: You can take a Bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

Expertise. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for an ability check you make using your Perception or Stealth skills.

Mage Hand Legerdemain: create an invisible spectral hand. Bonus Action: Stow or retrieve an object in / from a container on another creature; or use thieves' tools to pick locks or disarm traps.

Sneak Attack. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.

Thieves' Cant: You can speak the secret language of rogues.

attribs.name: other_proficiencies_and_languages
attribs.current:
Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Trade Tongue, Thieves' Cant

Alchemist's Supplies

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-KOVyWbvYNA3mQTkD2GD_atk_desc
attribs.current: You can use a Bonus action to make an attack with one of the above weapons in your off-hand. If so, do not add the +4 bonus to dmg.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-KOVzPI00qiDRVEDFqVw_spelldescription
attribs.current: Range: 120'. Ranged spell attack +5; Dmg: 2d10 fire. An unattended flammable object ignites.

attribs.name: treasure
attribs.current:
ALCHEMY JUG (Wondrous item, uncommon)
Action: 1/day, name one liquid at will and it will fill the jug (Acid 8 ounces; Oil 1 quart; Basic poison 1/2 ounce; Vinegar 2 gallons; Beer 4 gallons; Water, fresh 8 gallons; Honey 1 gallon; Water, salt 12 gallons; Mayonnaise 2 gallons; Wine 1 gallon)

Action: Uncork the jug and pour out the liquid (up to 2 gallons per minute up to the max amount listed above)

CLOAK OF ELVENKIND (Wondrous item, uncommon (requires attunement))
While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have a disadvantage and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current:
An orphan at a young age, Chitrick grew up in the streets, quickly learning to use her small size and quick claws to make a modest living. After seeing a traveling merchant selling cure-all elixirs, she got the idea to start making "potions" of her own. She was soon jailed for selling the useless snake-oil, but had the good fortune to share a cell with a  drunken dwar named Groffdorin. The gruff dwarf was entertained by Chitrick and told her if she was serious about her craft he would teach her to make a potent ale called "moonshine". 

The dwarf's trust in her awoke a dedication she hand not felt before and she took to her training in earnest. Of course, Groffdorin was part of an adventuring group and he was soon off on some grand adventure, leaving Chitrick to fend for her own.

Now a fairly skilled 'shiner, Chitrick made a legal living making and selling her wares. Her near venture soon ended when a couple of amateur thugs smashed her cart full of goods and then demanded protection money. The next day, when they returned and Chitrick refused to pay, they received a nasty suprise when they smashed the first of her jugs and - BOOM! Then one after the other, jugs began to explode and pour out gas. Chitrick quickly left the smoking street corner - and the town - behind.

Coming to the conclusion that a sage or a wizard might know even better secret recipes for poultices, drinks, or spirits, Chitrick began trading kegs of her 'shine for scrolls, books, and scraps of arcane knowledge. Armed with new insights, Chitrick's skills blossomed, both a s a merchant and as a rogue with a flare for the arcane. After a while she decided that perhaps Groffdorin had the right idea to head out into the world to experience what it had to offer. To that end, she sought out a group of adventurers to serve as companions, protectors, and mostly importantly - tasters!

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Everything I do is for the common people.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple's Hierarchy.

attribs.name: features_and_traits
attribs.current:
Darkvision 60'

Dwarven Resilience: 
advantage on poison saves and resistance to poison dmg

Dwarven combat training:
proficiency with battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, warhammer

Dwarven tougness: 
1 extra hit point per level

attribs.name: additional_feature_and_traits
attribs.current:
Proficient with light armor, medium armor, shield, simple weapons

Shelter of the Faithful: You and your companions can receive free healing and care at temples of your faith.

Divine Domain Life: healing spells restore an additional 2+ spell level of health.

Preserve Life: Can use channel divinity to instead restore a number of hit points equal to 5 times your cleric level. Choose any number of creatures within 30 feet of you to divide the healing among, can not restore a creature to more than half their health. This ability does not work on undead or constructs.

Channel Divinity (1/Rest): Turn Undead within 30 feet. Undead must make a Wisdom DC equal to the spell save DC or be turned for 1 minute. A turned creature must spend its turn moving away from you.

attribs.name: treasure
attribs.current:
Staff of Healing
This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability modifier: cure wounds (1 charge / spell lvl, up to 4th), lesser restoration (2 charges), or mass cure wounds (5 charges).

The staff regains 1d6+4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff vanishes in a flash of light, lost forever.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current:
Raised as a cleric in a temple of Ninkash, Krognar spent his time studying and praying, fortifying himself against any weakness.

He lived his life being a shield for the common folk, taking their burdens onto himself with unshakable faith and unending resilience.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I fleeced the wrong person and must work to ensure that this individual never crosses paths with me or those I care about.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I'm always in debt. I spend my ill-gotten gains on decadent luxuries faster than I can bring them in.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current:
For most of your life, you've been apprenticed to the wizardess Volva. You have only the vaguest memories of your family. 
​
​During your years of tutelage, you met Chitrick. At the time, she was a novice member of the local thieves guild. You both had dreams of making it big on your own.
​
​Once your training was completed, you two set about to making your fortunes. You started by seducing drunken soldiers and robbing them while they slept. But, you soon realized the real money was to be made from nobles.
​
​You created a personae named Lady Fellisam Glorium (your real name is Maddie). lady Fellisam was an expert at getting men to spend money on her. Often, she would use her identity to case a nobles home to burgled later by Chitrick.
​
​Your laster caper landed you in hot water. You stole a prized possession (a brooch of shielding) from a local lord and he somehow knows you did it. While you and Chitrick were lying low in a local tavern, a bunch of the local lord's men spotted you and tried to haul you off.
​
​But that's when Vennar stepped in. Apparently, the tavern owner also acts as the bouncer and he drove the curs off with his fists.
​
​Since then, you two have been inseparable. You've never felt this way about anyone before. You feel badly for continuing to lie to him about your identity, but aren't sure Vennar would look at you the same way if he knew you were a sham. So, you continue to be Lady Glorium.

attribs.name: features_and_traits
attribs.current:
Arcane Recovery
Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level of 2.

Hypnotic Gaze: As an action, choose one creature that you can see within 5 feet of you. If the target can see or hear you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 14) or be charmed by you until the end of your next turn. The charmed creature's speed drops to 0, and the creature is incapacitated and visibly dazed. On subsequent turns, you can use your action to maintain this effect, extending its duration until the end of your next turn. However, the effect ends if you move more than 5 feet away from the creature, if the creature can neither see nor hear you, or if the creature takes damage. Once the effect ends, or if the creature succeeds on its initial saving throw against this effect, you can't use this feature on that creature again until you finish a long rest.

Favorite Scheme: I insinuate myself into people's lives to prey on their weakness and secure their fortunes.

attribs.name: other_proficiencies_and_languages
attribs.current:
Disguise Kit
Forgery Kit
Trade Tongue
Elvish
Thieves' Cant

attribs.current: Signet Ring of an Imaginary Duke

attribs.name: additional_feature_and_traits
attribs.current:
Feature: False Identity
You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona. Additionally, you can forge documents including official papers and personal letters, as long as you have seen an example of the kind of document or the handwriting you are trying to copy.

Darkvision: you can see in dim light within 60 feet as if you were in bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim.

Fey Ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Ritual Casting: You can cast a wizard spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell in your spellbook. You don't need to have the spell prepared.

attribs.name: treasure
attribs.current:
Brooch of Shielding
Wondrous item, uncommon (requires attunement)
While wearing this brooch, you have resistance to force damage, and you have immunity to damage from the magic missile spell.

Bag of Holding
Wondrous item, uncommon
This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions, roughly 2 feet in diameter at the mouth and 4 feet deep. The bag can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet. The bag weighs 15 pounds, regardless of its contents. Retrieving an item from the bag requires an action.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Charity: I always try to help those in need, no matter the personal cost.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Everything I do is for the common people.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my god.

attribs.name: features_and_traits
attribs.current:
Divine Sense: Action; 4x per long rest. Until end of your next turn, you know the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60' of you, not behind full cover.

Lay on Hands: Action; 15 hp pool. Can spend any amount of pool to restore hit points. Also spend 5 hp to cure 1 disease or 1 poison affect.

Fighting Style: Great Weapon Fighting; Re-roll a 1 or 2 on damage dice with any 2-hand versatile melee weapon.

Divine Smite: When you hit with a melee attack you can expend one paladin spell to add radiant damage. 2d8 dmg for 1st level spell; 1d8 additional against fiends or undead.

Divine Health: You are immune to disease.

Sacred Oath: Devotion
Oath Spells: Protection from Evil and Good, Sanctuary. These are always prepared.

Channel Divinity: Once per short or long rest. 
Sacred Weapon: Action; For 1 minute you add Cha modifer to your weapon. Weapon also emits 20' of bright light and another 20' of dim light and becomes magical. 
Turn the Unholy: Action; Each fiend or undead that can see/hear you in 30' makes a DC 13 Wis save or must move away from you for 1 minute or until damaged.

attribs.name: treasure
attribs.current: A purse full of coins to fund your campaign against evil. Also, the Lord has blessed you with a Cloak of Protection to keep you safe.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current:
I was sent to live with the monks of Te Nar-Un at the age of 11. I did not know it at the time, but it was the Lord Khors' will that I come to serve him. That is why my father drank every day and sent me away.

My brothers did not speak much, but I found great knowledge in the library at Te Nar-Un. I leared of Khors and how I could best serve him. I learned how to cleanse poison and disease from those that could come to serve the Lord.

At 18 I left the monastery to go into the world and spread my Lord's message. I would bring light to the dark places wherever they may be found. It is the will of Khors that I take up the mantle of savior. Not for my own glory, but for His glory.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I face problems head-on. A simple direct solution is the best path to success.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Those who fight beside me are those worth dying for.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.

attribs.name: features_and_traits
attribs.current:
Fighting Style: Great Weapon

Second Wind: Can restore 1d10+3 in hit points once. This ability replenishes after a short or long rest.

Action Surge (one use): Can take another action. This ability replenishes after a short or long rest.

Martial Archetype Champion: Weapon attacks score a critical hit on 19 or 20.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current:
His family has a long tradition of soldiers. He went through the training and served several years, slowly coming to resent those that just directed soldiers without being on the field with them. He had lost too many good men to poor decisions.

He retired once he reached his thirties and became a bartender that also acted as a bouncer. His fighting prowess and the way he carried himself made it so only the fools would start something in the bar.

attribs.name: additional_feature_and_traits
attribs.current: Proficiencies: All armor, shields, simple weapons, martial weapons
